Name: MinCycleTime
Description: Minimize average lead time per feature

Name: MaxQuality
Description: Maximize quality score based on test coverage and bug count

Name: MinBugCount
Description: Minimize number of open bugs at end of sprint

Name: MinCostVariance
Description: Minimize variance between actual and budgeted cost

Name: MaxOnTimeDelivery
Description: Maximize percentage of features delivered on or before deadline

Name: MinBlockers
Description: Minimize average number of blocker incidents per sprint

Name: MaxTeamUtilization
Description: Maximize ratio of actual effort to available capacity

Name: MinOvertime
Description: Minimize total overtime hours across all team members
